Detailed Description

This sensor class is used to retrieve point cloud data

ros::NodeHandle *  _nh,
std::string  _point_cloud_topic,
std::string  _camera_info_topic 
)

The constructor for the depth camera class.

Parameters
_namethe name of the sensor, required by the base sensor class
_nhthe nodehandle to publish data on
_point_cloud_topicthe topic to retrieve pcl data from
_camera_info_topicthe topic holding information about the camera
